duck: Closed circle - A closed circle argument is one that is unfalsifiable.
Denialism - Denialism is choosing to deny reality as a way to avoid an uncomfortable truth.

Climate change denial - Climate change denial is a set of organized attempts to downplay, deny or dismiss the scientific consensus on the extent of global warming, its significance, and its connection to human behavior...

Cognitive dissonance - In modern psychology, cognitive dissonance is the discomfort experienced when simultaneously holding two or more conflicting cognitions: ideas, beliefs, values or emotional reactions.
denial definition: refusal to satisfy a request or desire.
Denial, in ordinary English usage, is asserting that a statement or allegation is not true.
